member.name: T:DotNetOpenAPI.Controllers.EmployeesController
member.summary: This controller is responsible for handling requests related to employees CRUD operations. Will provide the necessary http response codes and data. The controller will interact with the ICURDActions interface to get the data.

member.name: M:DotNetOpenAPI.Controllers.EmployeesController.GetEmployees
member.summary: License Information: All rights reserved by Kaushik Natua
member.remarks:
This method will return all the employees present under EmployeeList
You can do futher modification of the code to check for an empty list and return 404 Not Found
Sample request:
Get: /api/Employees
Sample Response: [ { "id": 1, "name": "John", "department": "IT", "email": "john@hyland.com" }, { "id": 2, "name": "Jane", "department": "HR", "email": "jane@hyland.com"
} ]
member.returns: 200 OK with the list of employees

members.member:
Get an employee by id
/// This method will return an employee if searched id is present under EmployeeList
If the employee is not found, it will return 404 Not Found
Sample request:
Get: /api/Employees/1
Sample Response:
{ "id": 1, "name": "John", "department": "IT", "email": "john@hyland.com" }
Sample request:
Get: /api/Employees/123456
Sample Response:
404 Not Found
The id of the employee 200 OK with the employee data 404 Not Found if the employee is not found
